# Elixir Naming Conventions

> Use `snake_case` for variables, function names, and module attributes.

> Use `CamelCase` for module names and struct names.

> Choose descriptive and meaningful names for variables, functions, and modules. Avoid overly short or cryptic names.

## References

- [Naming Conventions - Variables (Elixir Docs)](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/naming-conventions.html#variables)
- [Naming Conventions - Modules and Structs (Elixir Docs)](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/naming-conventions.html#modules-and-structs)
